mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.user_id, t2.name AS user_name, t1.org_id, t3.name AS org_name, t1.trace_id, t1.environment, t1.url, t1.http_method, t1.permission_code, t1.role_id, t1.user_agent, t1.client_ip, t1.class_name, t1.method_name, t1.server_ip, t1.start_time, t1.end_time, t1.duration, t1.is_success FROM wdf_access_log t1 LEFT JOIN wdf_user t2 ON (t1.user_id = t2.id) LEFT JOIN wdf_org t3 ON (t1.org_id = t2.id) WHERE t1.id = #{id}
